name: Plane Flight Simulator
description:
Fly an airplane and float in sky in the aircraft simulator! Dream about becoming a pilot and fly in blue skies? Learn in real 3D simulation! Warm up engines, raise the speed, pull the helm and blast off the airport runway! Don't forget to hide landing wheels and watch the flight indicators and the fuel level! Flying a plane is not easy - not everyone can be a pilot! Prevent air crash in critical moments and extreme situations! Don't hit the ground!

Get yourself the best plane and go HIGHER!

+Ultra REALISTIC 3D graphics and cool animations
+ Tons of real-life planes: from single engine props to SUPERSONIC JETS, from airliners to military aircraft
+ Fun and challenging missions: emergencies, rescue missions, rough landings, fires, races
+ Immersive scenario: explore a huge open map with tons of surprises in free flight mode
+ Intuitive mobile controls and an ADDICTING gameplay
